metadata.title: CVE-2024-46736 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:smb: client: fix double put of @cfile in smb2_rename_path()If smb2_set_path_attr() is called with a valid @cfile and returned-EINVAL, we need to call cifs_get_writable_path() again as thereference of @cfile was already dropped by previous smb2_compound_op()call.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
